titles.title: Expressing support for designation of April as "National Donate Life Month" and expressing gratitude to all Americans who have communicated their intent to be organ and tissue donors.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 4/9/2008--Introduced. Expresses support for: (1) the designation of a National Donate Life Month; (2) Americans who have communicated their intent to be organ and tissue donors upon their deaths; and (3) the public events that will be conducted in April to thank donors and their families and to publicize the organ shortage.
